name: Everest Solitaire - iEverest
description:
Everest Solitaire has a simple and intuitive interface with a smart gameplay that provides a dynamic game experience even in portable devices.

The iEverest rules were created to provide a true challenge in an engaging game! If your looking for a bigger challenge, try the medium or hard level!

Main features:

- The interface adjusts for righties or lefties
- Tips with the possible moves
- Night mode: great for playing on the bed
- Big cards
- The interface is fairly easy to use
- Great winning animations
- Cards animations
- Universal app (iPhone and iPad)
- Unlimited undo steps
- Game Center (leaderboards and achievements)
- Sound effects
- It’s possible to restart the game
- 3 difficulty levels
- Drag and drop
